Attack Order:15:90:100:The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.:Bug
Bug Bite:20:60:100:The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry
column2: the user eats it and gains its effect.:Bug

column1: Bug Buzz:10:90:100:The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.:Bug
Defend Order:10:--:101:The user calls out its underlings to shield its body
column2: raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.:Bug

column1: Fell Stinger:25:50:100:When the user knocks out a target with this move
column2: the user's Attack stat rises drastically.:Bug

column1: First Impression:10:90:100:Although this move has great power
column2: it only works the first turn each time the user enters battle.:Bug

column1: Fury Cutter:20:40:95:The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.:Bug

column2: paralyzed
column3: or asleep status condition on opponents.:Bug

column1: Heal Order:10:--:101:This move can't be used. It's recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten
column2: this move can't be remembered.:Bug

column1: Infestation:20:20:100:The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.:Bug
Leech Life:10:80:100:The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.:Bug
Lunge:15:80:100:The user makes a lunge at the target
column2: attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.:Bug

column1: Max Flutterby:10:--:101:This is a Bug-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.:Bug
Megahorn:10:120:85:Using its tough and impressive horn
column2: the user rams into the target with no letup.:Bug

column1: Pin Missile:20:25:95:Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.:Bug

column2: it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.:Bug

column1: Powder:20:--:100:The user covers the target in a combustible powder. If the target uses a Fire-type move
column2: the powder explodes and damages the target.:Bug

column1: Quiver Dance:20:--:101:The user lightly performs a beautiful
column2: mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk

column1: Rage Powder:20:--:101:The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opposing Pokémon aim only at the user.:Bug
